document.full_text: in the wake of japan's nuclear crisis, the world health organization (who) issued fresh guidelines on how to minimize exposure to radiation that can cause cancers, especially in children and young adults.
document.title: who issues guidelines on radiation exposure
lines_and_colors: in the wake of japan's nuclear crisis, the world health organization (who) issued fresh guidelines on how to minimize exposure to radiation that can cause cancers, especially in children and young adults.
